text: Anata gata no omo no o yurushi o koi negae. Soshite anata gata wa, kaigo shite kare no moto ni kaere,(-so sureba arra wa) sadame rareta jiki made iroirona yoi mono o kyoju sa seru. Mata koseki no oi mono ni wa, sorezore hofu ni megumi o atae rareru.Daga moshi, somuki sarunaraba, watashi wa anata gata no tame ni idaina-bi no chobatsu o osoreru
